verses.verse: And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Sanctify <WH6942> <WH8761> unto me all the firstborn <WH1060>, whatsoever openeth <WH6363> the womb <WH7358> among the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, both of man <WH120> and of beast <WH929>: it is mine.

And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the people <WH5971>, Remember <WH2142> <WH8800> this <WH2088> day <WH3117>, in which ye came out <WH3318> <WH8804> from Egypt <WH4714>, out of the house <WH1004> of bondage <WH5650>; for by strength <WH2392> of hand <WH3027> the YY <WH3068> brought you out <WH3318> <WH8689> from this place: there shall no leavened bread <WH2557> be eaten <WH398> <WH8735>.
This day <WH3117> came ye out <WH3318> <WH8802> in the month <WH2320> Abib <WH24>.

And it shall be when the YY <WH3068> shall bring <WH935> <WH8686> thee into the land <WH776> of the Kanahanites <WH3669>, and the Hittites <WH2850>, and the Amorites <WH567>, and the Hivites <WH2340>, and the Y'vusis <WH2983>, which he sware <WH7650> <WH8738> unto thy fathers <WH1> to give <WH5414> <WH8800> thee, a land <WH776> flowing <WH2100> <WH8802> with milk <WH2461> and honey <WH1706>, that thou shalt keep <WH5647> <WH8804> this service <WH5656> in this month <WH2320>.
Seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> thou shalt eat <WH398> <WH8799> matzah <WH4682>, and in the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> shall be a feast <WH2282> to the YY <WH3068>.

Unleavened bread <WH4682> shall be eaten <WH398> <WH8735> seven <WH7651> days <WH3117>; and there shall no leavened bread <WH2557> be seen <WH7200> <WH8735> with thee, neither shall there be leaven <WH7603> seen <WH7200> <WH8735> with thee in all thy quarters <WH1366>.

And thou shalt shew <WH5046> <WH8689> thy son <WH1121> in that day <WH3117>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, This is done because of <WH5668> that <WH2088> which the YY <WH3068> did <WH6213> <WH8804> unto me when I came forth <WH3318> <WH8800> out of Egypt <WH4714>.

And it shall be for a sign <WH226> unto thee upon thine hand <WH3027>, and for a memorial <WH2146> between thine eyes <WH5869>, that the YY'S <WH3068> Torah <WH8451> may be in thy mouth <WH6310>: for with a strong <WH2389> hand <WH3027> hath the YY <WH3068> brought thee out <WH3318> <WH8689> of Egypt <WH4714>.
Thou shalt therefore keep <WH8104> <WH8804> this ordinance <WH2708> in his season <WH4150> from year <WH3117> to year <WH3117>.

And it shall be when the YY <WH3068> shall bring <WH935> <WH8686> thee into the land <WH776> of the Kanahanites <WH3669>, as he sware <WH7650> <WH8738> unto thee and to thy fathers <WH1>, and shall give <WH5414> <WH8804> it thee,

That thou shalt set apart <WH5674> <WH8689> unto the YY <WH3068> all that openeth <WH6363> the matrix <WH7358>, and every firstling <WH6363> that cometh <WH7698> of a beast <WH929> which thou hast; the males <WH2145> shall be the YY'S <WH3068>.

And every firstling <WH6363> of an ass <WH2543> thou shalt redeem <WH6299> <WH8799> with a lamb <WH7716>; and if thou wilt not redeem <WH6299> <WH8799> it, then thou shalt break his neck <WH6202> <WH8804>: and all the firstborn <WH1060> of man <WH120> among thy children <WH1121> shalt thou redeem <WH6299> <WH8799>.

And it shall be when thy son <WH1121> asketh <WH7592> <WH8799> thee in time to come <WH4279>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, What is this? that thou shalt say <WH559> <WH8804> unto him, By strength <WH2392> of hand <WH3027> the YY <WH3068> brought us out <WH3318> <WH8689> from Egypt <WH4714>, from the house <WH1004> of bondage <WH5650>:

And it came to pass, when Pharaoh <WH6547> would hardly <WH7185> <WH8689> let us go <WH7971> <WH8763>, that the YY <WH3068> slew <WH2026> <WH8799> all the firstborn <WH1060> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, both the firstborn <WH1060> of man <WH120>, and the firstborn <WH1060> of beast <WH929>: therefore I sacrifice <WH2076> <WH8802> to the YY <WH3068> all that openeth <WH6363> the matrix <WH7358>, being males <WH2145>; but all the firstborn <WH1060> of my children <WH1121> I redeem <WH6299> <WH8799>.

And it shall be for a token <WH226> upon thine hand <WH3027>, and for frontlets <WH2903> between thine eyes <WH5869>: for by strength <WH2392> of hand <WH3027> the YY <WH3068> brought us forth <WH3318> <WH8689> out of Egypt <WH4714>.

And it came to pass, when Pharaoh <WH6547> had let the people <WH5971> go <WH7971> <WH8763>, that 'Elohim <WH430> led <WH5148> <WH8804> them not through the way <WH1870> of the land <WH776> of the Philistines <WH6430>, although <WH3588> that was near <WH7138>; for 'Elohim <WH430> said <WH559> <WH8804>, Lest peradventure the people <WH5971> repent <WH5162> <WH8735> when they see <WH7200> <WH8800> war <WH4421>, and they return <WH7725> <WH8804> to Egypt <WH4714>:

But 'Elohim <WH430> led <WH5437> the people <WH5971> about <WH5437> <WH8686>, through the way <WH1870> of the wilderness <WH4057> of the Red <WH5488> sea <WH3220>: and the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> went up <WH5927> <WH8804> harnessed <WH2571> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> took <WH3947> <WH8799> the bones <WH6106> of Yosef <WH3130> with him: for he had straitly <WH7650> <WH8687> sworn <WH7650> <WH8689> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, 'Elohim <WH430> will surely <WH6485> <WH8800> visit <WH6485> <WH8799> you; and ye shall carry up <WH5927> my bones <WH6106> away <WH5927> <WH8689> hence with you.
And they took their journey <WH5265> <WH8799> from Sukkot <WH5523>, and encamped <WH2583> <WH8799> in Etham <WH864>, in the edge <WH7097> of the wilderness <WH4057>.

And the YY <WH3068> went <WH1980> <WH8802> before <WH6440> them by day <WH3119> in a pillar <WH5982> of a cloud <WH6051>, to lead <WH5148> <WH8687> them the way <WH1870>; and by night <WH3915> in a pillar <WH5982> of fire <WH784>, to give them light <WH215> <WH8687>; to go <WH3212> <WH8800> by day <WH3119> and night <WH3915>:
He took not away <WH4185> <WH8686> the pillar <WH5982> of the cloud <WH6051> by day <WH3119>, nor the pillar <WH5982> of fire <WH784> by night <WH3915>, from before <WH6440> the people <WH5971>.
